faqs.question: Which cars are available right now?
faqs.answer: Currently available models are: Brezza, i20, Seltos, XUV300, Swift, EcoSport, Taigun, Slavia, Kiger, Hector, and Polo.

faqs.question: Is the Tata Punch available?
faqs.answer: No, the Tata Punch is currently out of stock. You can ask me to notify you when it's back in stock!

faqs.question: How much does the Hyundai i20 cost?
faqs.answer: The 2023 Hyundai i20 is priced at ₹8,20,000.

faqs.question: What is the mileage of the Skoda Slavia?
faqs.answer: The Skoda Slavia offers a mileage of 18.0 kmpl in its petrol manual variant.

faqs.question: Do you have electric cars?
faqs.answer: At the moment we do not stock any electric vehicles, but we can notify you when we get them!

faqs.question: How do I book a test drive?
faqs.answer: I can help you book a test drive. Please provide your name, contact number, car model, preferred date (YYYY-MM-DD), and time (HH:MM).

faqs.question: I want to book a test drive for Volkswagen Taigun.
faqs.answer: Great choice! Please share your full name.

faqs.question: My name is Priya Sharma.
faqs.answer: Hi Priya! Could you please provide your contact number?

faqs.question: My phone number is 9876543210.
faqs.answer: Thanks! Which car model would you like to test drive?

faqs.question: I'd like to test drive the Taigun.
faqs.answer: Perfect. On which date would you like to schedule it? (Format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Noted. At what time? (Format: HH:MM, e.g., 11:00)
Thank you! Let me confirm—Priya Sharma, 9876543210, Volkswagen Taigun on 2025-05-28 at 11:30. Shall I finalize this booking?

faqs.question: Yes, please finalize.
faqs.answer: Your test drive is booked! We'll send a confirmation SMS shortly. Anything else I can help with?

faqs.question: Can you compare Swift and Baleno?
faqs.answer: Maruti Swift (₹6.2L, 21.2 kmpl) vs Maruti Baleno (₹7.1L, 22.0 kmpl). Swift is sportier; Baleno has more cabin space.

faqs.question: What financing options do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer EMIs starting at 7.5% p.a. over 12-60 months. Typical down payment is 10-20%.

faqs.question: How long does a test drive take?
faqs.answer: Standard test drives last about 30 minutes, including a short showroom tour.

faqs.question: Do I need to bring any documents?
faqs.answer: Just your driver's license and a copy of your ID proof.

faqs.question: Can I reschedule my test drive?
faqs.answer: Yes—just let me know your booking ID or details, and I'll help you reschedule.

faqs.question: Thank you!
faqs.answer: You're welcome! Feel free to ask anything else about our cars or services.
